Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Level Description: Advanced (complete and accurate representation of all elements)
CAN: The student can accurately draw a string telephone connecting two students, clearly showing how it is used for communication over long distances.
The student can illustrate the concept of sound traveling through the string by including arrows or waves, demonstrating the functionality of the string telephone.
The student can correctly depict materials like cups and string in their drawing, making sure to emphasize that only these materials are used.
The student can highlight how the string telephone device allows communication by effectively demonstrating that sound travels through the string, showing that it meets its purpose.
The student can represent the string telephone as a solution for communication using sound instead of light, clearly differentiating between the two forms of transmitting messages.
CANNOT: The student might miss adding minor details such as labeling the students or the cups, but this does not significantly impact the understanding of the concept.
